title: Freezing Smite, BotRK, and Exhaust
body: Seriously.  Try it.  Bonus points for doing it on Sejuani.

replies.body:
Don't do it on Sejuani. At least don't ruin my main with BoTRK.

Exhaust/chilling smite sure, but she has like less than zero use for BotRK.

Get Twin Shadows if you didn't want a Mallet/Rylai's because you were using BotRK in the first place.
botrk is 110% efficient on anything with a fist. srry {{champion:34}}
OH! Do Crystal Scepter and Frozen Mallet too! All the slows!

I remember when i was sejuani vs yi
mtherfker couldnt be slowed gg

Slows are gooood :)

This stuff makes Rek'Sai even more broken as well hehe
